inclusion.criterion: American Society of Anesthesiologists (ASA) physical status I-II
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Patients scheduled for mastoidectomy and tympanoplasty.
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: preoperative medication of antipsychotics or neuroleptics known to interact with non-depolarizing neuromuscular blocking agents (NMBAs)
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: The patient has a history of Wegener's granulomatosis and is currently being treated with corticosteroid and cyclophosphamides. He has a positive serum MPO-ANCA in his medical record.
